main: ^I am guard Voldemort of the King's Legion.
^Have you heard about the horrific attack a few moments ago?

c-0: ^I was lucky not to be here
^Yeah you are not alone in this one kid,
c-1: ^Not so lucky as Gindron might strike again.
^We need to prepare for the attack
c-2: ^I was on guard duty outside of village, I only now realize the destruction that happened.

c-0: ^I don't know, right now I need to find someone to rescue the daughter of the blacksmith.
^What a hero, go and meet him at the blacksmith store.
c-1: ^Disgusting question at such times, but yeah he will give a few coins.
^Gindron, Lord of the red attacked our village
^His minions took hostage the blacksmith's daughter.

c-0: ^How bout you son? You seem like you can lift a blade
^Go and meet the blacksmith at his store.
c-1: ^Every hard job pays, even during these hours,
^Go meet the blacksmith at his store.
^How bout you go save her young soldier?

c-0: ^Go and meet the blacksmith at his store.
c-1: ^Every hard job pays, even during these hours,
^Go meet the blacksmith at his store.
